sentences.sContent: ...a machine which, in some respects, was the forerunner of the modern helicopter.
sentences.sCn: …一台在某些方面是现代直升飞机的前身的机器。

trans.tranCn: 先驱(者), 传令官, 预兆
trans.tranOther: If you describe a person or thing as the forerunner of someone or something similar, you mean they existed before them and either influenced their development or were a sign of what was going to happen
